api_list.name: Keyword Extraction - Job Skill Extraction
api_list.description:
Extract skills from job descriptions. 

Keyword Extraction API provides a professional keyword extractor service which is based on advanced Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning technologies. It can be used to extract important skills keywords from the text the user-provided. If you want to test our automatic keyword extraction service, you can use our free automatic keyword extractor online demo:
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skill-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/skill_extraction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skill-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://skill-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/skill_extraction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skill-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
